mutants.code:
def rotate(cube):
    n = len(cube)
    for layer in range(n / 2):
        (first, last) = (layer, n - layer - 1)
        for i in range(first, last):
            top = cube[layer][i]
            cube[layer][i] = cube[last - i][layer]
            cube[last - i][layer] = cube[last][last - i]
            cube[last][last - i] = cube[i][last]
            cube[i][last] = top
    return cube

def rotate(cube):
    n = len(cube)
    for layer in range(n * 2):
        (first, last) = (layer, n - layer - 1)

            top = cube[layer][i]
            cube[layer][i] = cube[last - i][layer]
            cube[last - i][layer] = cube[last][last - i]
            cube[last][last - i] = cube[i][last]
            cube[i][last] = top
    return cube
